title: 你以為美國獨立時，個個都係華盛頓咁高尚咩

replies.msg:
大半年前，因為一部小弟睇咗15分鐘就冇睇嘅電影（Quentin Tarantino 嘅 The Hateful Eight），寫咗個筆記。部電影太過美國本土，我唔係好睇得明，所以15分鐘就 bye bye。不過，留意到就係，美國立國初期，其實係品流複雜，完全唔係一個漂亮嘅畫面。

跟住就搵咗一小段美國獨立嘅歷史嚟睇，寫咗個筆記，全文如下：

The American Revolution - Loyalists, Fence-sitters, and Patriots
http://www.ushistory.org/us/11b.asp
好有趣嘅分析，當日美國醞釀獨立之時，其實有幾多建制（loyalists），有幾多泛民（fence-sitters），又有幾多本土派（patriots）呢？

有說係各三分一，不過亦有分析話當時嘅本土派其實唔係咁多，建制反而多啲，而最多嘅係－－泛民...

不過最後本土派宣傳成功，將好多泛民轉化成本土。

至於當時美國嘅本土派係咪個個都英明神武呢？其實唔係，當時美國嘅本土派係散沙一盤，甚至有人形容只係一班流氓... 佢哋對建制一啲都唔客氣，會餵佢哋食屎，譚耀宗請留意：
In Taylor’s age of revolutions, dirty hands abound (and not just figuratively: patriots smeared loyalists’ homes and mouths with feces)
https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2016/12/the-accidental-patriots/505835

人係有 selective memory 嘅，而社會亦一樣，時間耐咗，就只記得美好嘅一面，本來真實嘅血肉模糊部分就會漸忘，大家只記得華盛頓英明神武，謝弗遜文采飛揚，餵人食屎嘅場面，不提也罷。

其實當時美國嘅本土派，真正團結之時，就係英國決定打仗，忽然之間，本土派變成一體。
When the British Army marched out of Boston on April 19, 1775, messengers on horseback, including Boston silversmith Paul Revere, fanned out across New England to raise the alarm. Summoned by the feverish pealing of church bells, militiamen from countless hamlets hurried toward Concord, Massachusetts, where the British regulars planned to destroy a rebel arsenal. Thousands of militiamen arrived in time to fight; 89 men from 23 towns in Massachusetts were killed or wounded on that first day of war, April 19, 1775. By the next morning, Massachusetts had 12 regiments in the field. Connecticut soon mobilized a force of 6,000, one-quarter of its military-age men. Within a week, 16,000 men from the four New England colonies formed a siege army outside British-occupied Boston. In June, the Continental Congress took over the New England army, creating a national force, the Continental Army. Thereafter, men throughout America took up arms. It seemed to the British regulars that every able-bodied American male had become a soldier.
《Myths of the American Revolution》
https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/myths-of-the-american-revolution-10941835

今時今日，打仗係好低嘅機會，尤其是當日美國國土其實大過英國，而人口亦唔少，英國要海運士兵去美國打仗，可以講未打先輸人數。香港同中国完全唔係呢種比例，中国人口相等於200個香港，而亦冇一個大西洋隔住。

今時今日，打嘅係經濟戰，人口比例係次要，IQ 比例先至係致勝關鍵，而呢個戰場，特朗普幫我哋開咗。

（寫於 2018年12月10日）
